DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to identify age-related changes in chinese meibomian glands that may be associated with meibomian gland dysfunction (MGD).
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Meibomian Gland Dysfunction in Chinese Old Patients
DOC.criteria: have dry eye symptom have meibomian gland dysfunction diabetes history of ocular surgery systemic disease or inflammation
